title: The Latest Release link is out-of-date
description: Navigating from the website to Resources->Docs, under Release Documentation, the link called Latest Release points to 5.3.1 docs. The homepage lists 5.5.0 as the latest.

comments.author: Anshum Gupta
comments.content: Thanks for notifying Scott Stults. I've fixed it to point to 5.5.0.
